meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the cashew family, including poison ivy and sumac.
meanings.sent1: The rhus plant can cause skin irritation.
meanings.sent2: I spotted some poison ivy, a type of rhus, while hiking.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played in the rhus bushes and got a rash.
meanings.sent4: Her reaction to the rhus plant was as sudden as a lightning strike.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the rhus plant's leaves, they can make you itch uncontrollably.

meanings.definition: A resin obtained from certain species of plants in the genus Rhus, used in varnishes and lacquers.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman applied a coat of rhus resin to the wood.
meanings.sent2: The varnish contained a hint of the fragrant rhus resin.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally spilled the sticky rhus resin on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The scent of the rhus resin lingered in the workshop like a sweet memory.
meanings.sent5: The rhus resin added a glossy finish to the furniture, enhancing its beauty.
